name: Akuo
description:
fast paced  randomly generated 2d platformer that will get you hooked! your goal is to collect as much coins as you can! every time you get to the end of a level you'll get 10 coins. if you die (by falling of the platform or by colliding with an enemy) you'll lose all of your coins.

                                                                         keys:

                   only the space bar, the longer you push it the higher you jump

*THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 3 HOURS*
